鯜鯜鯜

鯜字的基本解释

鯜
qiè
即“鳑鲏鱼”，一种身体侧扁的小鱼。

鯜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiè］
［《廣韻》七接切，入葉，清。］
［《廣韻》即葉切，入葉，精。］
妾鱼。即鳑鲏鱼。

鯜字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鯜； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1472第19
【唐韻】【集韻】?七接切，音妾。【說文】魚名。出樂浪潘國。【正字通】卽妾魚，其行以三爲率，一前二後若婢妾。【集韻】或作鰈。又【集韻】卽涉切，音接。義同。

鯜字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鯜字的起名意思

暂无。

鯜
Basic explanation of words
鯜
qiè
Namely "Tortoise", a small fish with a flat side.
鯜
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiè］
["Guangyun" seven consecutive cuts, into the leaves, Qing. ]
["Guangyun" means that the leaves are cut, enter the leaves, and refined. ]
Concubine fish. That is tortoise fish.
鯜
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鯜; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1472 Page 19
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Seven cuts, sound concubine. [Said the text] The name of the fish. Le Lang Pan Guo. [Zhengzitong] Yu concubine fish, whose line is three as the rate, one in the front and two in the back is like a concubine. 【Ji Yun】or as a flounder. Also 【Jiyun】卽 involved cutting, phonetic connection. The same meaning.
鯜

鯜
Name meaning
Nothing.
qiè
сущ. зоол. ханкайский горчак (Acanthorthodeus chaunaensis)
